Title: When She Was Bad
Plot: Buffy returns from her summer vacation after defeating the Master and is not the same fun-loving slayer she used to be. When Cordelia and Ms. Calendar are kidnapped, it's up to her (yet again) to save the day.
GuestStars: Tamara Braun, Dean Butler, Brent Jennings, Robia LaMorte, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, Armin Shimerman, Kristine Sutherland
